item.title: Fixing INSTALL_IMAGE_LOADER_TIMED_OUT Error 52 on Crostini Linux Terminal for Chromebook
item.description:
When booting up the Ubuntu shell on my Chromebook, it usually just works. However, After I updated to a new version of Chromebook OS, I was getting this error:

vmshell failed:
Error starting crostini for terminal:
52 (INSTALL_IMAGE_LOADER_TIMED_OUT)

First, I restarted my Chromebook but the error persisted after restarting. So â€¦
item.dc:creator: lofipython
item.category: solving image loader timed out error
